snippet.title: Bellwright Launch Trailer December 2023
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam ► store.steampowered.com/app/1812450/Bellwright/
follow us on twitter ► twitter.com/BellwrightGame
follow us on tiktok ► tiktok.com/@bellwrightgame
join our subreddit ► reddit.com/r/Bellwright/
join our discord ► discord.gg/bellwrightoarjkgopiaerghk


After you were framed for the murder of the Prince and sentenced to death by the Crown, you've been living in the shadows ever since. But now, you'll step into the shoes of a weathered adventurer bent on restoring order to the kingdom. Explore a vast open world teeming with unique creatures, hidden treasures, and breathtaking landscapes. As you venture forth with friends (Co-op Enabled!), your choices will shape the fate of this realm and be among the first to forge your legacy in this captivating story. Stay tuned for further updates as we prepare for the grand unveiling this December!
